articles.title: Area with likely Zika Transmission (AZT)
articles.content:
Area with likely Zika Transmission (AZT) is notified when there are positive Zika virus signals in wastewater or mosquito samples detected in the vicinity of a reported Zika case.
To monitor the Zika situation, NEA began conducting wastewater testing... [505 chars]

articles.title: Cambodia threatens to ban Thai fruit and vegetable over border row
articles.description: PHNOM PENH: Cambodia's influential former leader Hun Sen on Monday (Jun 16) issued an ultimatum to Thailand to lift border crossing restrictions or his country will ban all Thai fruit and vegetable imports in the latest round of the border spat between the two countries. articles.title: Man suspected of shooting Minnesota lawmakers arrested after huge manhunt
articles.description: Vance Luther Boelter is accused of killing Democrat Melissa Hortman and her husband Mark, and injuring two others.
